burgers.name: Semi-American Burger
burgers.description: A 50% American burger. A 100% angus beef burger with Swiss cheese.

burgers.name: The Quick Fill
burgers.description: Prized for being ready in under 3 minutes, this burger is made from scratch on order. Comes with lettuce, cheddar cheese, and ketchup.

burgers.name: The Tall Stack
burgers.description: Three 100% angus beef patties stacked on top of each other in the middle of a buttered bun. Comes with cheddar cheese, ketchup, lettuce, and dill pickle wedge

burgers.name: The Grand Order
burgers.description: A two tiered burger with everything on it.

burgers.name: The Long Patty
burgers.description: A 100% angus beef burger prepared in a oblong tube rather than a patty. You may be tempted to call it a hot dog.

side-dishes.name: Original Fries
side-dishes.description: A relative mountain of our fries seasoned to perfection in our originial seasoning.

side-dishes.name: Round Fries
side-dishes.description: A basket of our homemade onion rings seasoned to perfection in our original seasiong.

side-dishes.name: Nuggets
side-dishes.description: Why should nuggest be served as the main course when you can serve them on the side with everything?!

side-dishes.name: The Garden
side-dishes.description: A freshly prepared salad with lettuce, tomato, and spinich.

side-dishes.name: Green Fries
side-dishes.description: Our newest creation. Lightly seasoned kale chips perfect for the health focused.

desserts.name: The Choco
desserts.description: It looks like a taco. It looks delicious. It's a dessert taco, yum.

desserts.name: The Perfect Malt
desserts.description: Our self-awarded award winning malt shake. Comes in any combination of chocolate, strawberry, or vanilla flavors.

desserts.name: The Original Cone
desserts.description: Our original ice cream cone. To this day it still costs only 75Â¢.

desserts.name: The Snowstorm
desserts.description: Our original ice cream shake creation. Served to you up-side-down.

desserts.name: The Fudge
desserts.description: The original fudge recipe developed by our founders' grandmothers years ago.
